Namaskaram {{FIRST_NAME}},

The countdown has now started for Sadhguru's event on 22nd January.
We invite you to bring your curiosity and your questions. Come be a part of this extraordinary opportunity to experience one’s natural state of freedom, love, and limitless joy.

With tickets available from 25$ onwards, no pre-requisite and chinese translation, this time it is available to people from all backgrounds!

Register

Seating Occupancy

  • Premium - 50% Filled
  • Preferred A - 57% Filled
  • Preferred B - 77% Filled (Closing soon!)
  • General A - 64% Filled
  • General B - 70% Filled (Closing soon!)

Offline registration

If you would prefer to register offline and get a printed ticket in hand, please contact 8439 2892

On the spot registration

On the spot registration will be available for remaining seats only! If you have not purchased your ticket until the event day, you can still get it at EXPO, on the day, although we cannot guarantee that your preferred seating category will be available.

Click below to hear others' experience with Sadhguru!

Inner Engineering Book launch
 

The tour will also include the launch of Sadhguru’s new book “Inner Engineering - A Yogi’s Guide to Joy” - New York Times Bestseller

Sadhguru presents readers with a path to achieving absolute wellbeing through the classical science of yoga and the book offers simple practices that can be done by anyone.

Special Offer - The “Inner Engineering” book will be available for a special discount of around 50% on that day!
